name.baseName: Waste water - treated ; Soil ex-situ remediation ; Ex-situ thermal desorption ; Soil excavation ; Foundation pit dewatering
处置后废水;土壤异位修复;异位热脱附;土壤挖掘;基坑降水

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Excavated and transport the soil to the ectopic thermal desorption equipment, where thermal desorption is carried out to achieve the removal of pollutants.
挖掘并运输到异位热脱附设备的土壤，在该环节进行热脱附，以实现污染物的去除。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit of LCA was defined as the treatment of 1000 m3 of contaminated soil to meet the risk-based remediation targets.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: A contaminated site located in Wuhan, China was selected as the case study. Approximately 1.25 million m3 of soil was found contaminated, and forty types of VOCs, SVOCs, and heavy metal contaminants were measured in the soil.
选择位于中国武汉的一个受污染场地作为案例研究。大约125万m3的土壤被受到污染，土壤中测量到40种VOC、SVOC和重金属污染物。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Contaminated soil is excavated and transferred into a rotatory thermal reactor for treatment under vacuumed and low oxygen conditions. The reactor is heated using flame, steam, or hot oil to remove organic contaminants (> 99%) and moisture from the soil. The vaporized contaminants enter a combustion chamber as gases or fine particles and are destroyed by incineration. The exhaust gas is emitted after proper treatment.
受污染的土壤被挖掘并转移到旋转式热反应器中，在真空和低氧条件下进行处理。使用火焰、蒸汽或热油加热反应器，以去除土壤中的有机污染物（>99%）和水分。蒸发的污染物以气体或细颗粒的形式进入燃烧室，并被焚烧破坏。废气经过适当处理后排放。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The soil ex-situ remediation process using ex-situ thermal desorption is designed for the treatment of contaminated soil primarily from industrial sites. This process is applicable for the removal of a wide range of soil contaminants, including volatile organic compounds (VOCs), semi-volatile organic compounds (SVOCs), and heavy metals. The treated soil is meant for sites where risk-based remediation targets are set to manage environmental hazards effectively.
土壤异位修复过程使用异位热脱附技术，主要用于工业场地受污染土壤的处理。该过程适用于去除各种土壤污染物，包括挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）、半挥发性有机化合物（SVOCs）和重金属。经处理的土壤适用于设定风险基准修复目标的场所，有效管理环境危害。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Guangji H ,Huan L ,Chang C , et al. Selection of green remediation alternatives for chemical industrial sites: An integrated life cycle assessment and fuzzy synthetic evaluation approach. Science of the Total Environment, 2022, 845 157211-157211.

Guangji H ,Huan L ,Chang C , et al. Selection of green remediation alternatives for chemical industrial sites: An integrated life cycle assessment and fuzzy synthetic evaluation approach. Science of the Total Environment, 2022, 845 157211-157211.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) of soil remediation, users should note that only the impacts from the operational phase of on-site remediation have been assessed. Hence, exclusion of the manufacturing of equipment impacts needs to be consistently applied in comparative studies. It is essential to apply the functional unit of the treatment of 1000 m3 of contaminated soil when gauging and comparing the efficacy of this process to others. Additionally, users need to ensure that the dataset is suitable for their specific regional context, especially if used in a different geographical location than Wuhan, China.
在使用该数据集进行土壤修复生命周期评价（LCA）时，用户应注意，仅评估了现场修复操作阶段的影响。因此，在比较研究中需要一致地排除设备制造影响。在衡量和比较该过程与其他过程的效果时，必须应用1000立方米受污染土壤处理的功能单元。此外，用户需要确保数据集适用于他们的具体区域背景，特别是如果在中国武汉以外的不同地理位置使用时。

completeness.common:other: Only impacts from the operational phase of site remediation were assessed, while impacts from the manufacturing of equipment were not considered in the LCA.
仅评估了现场修复操作阶段的影响，而LCA中未考虑设备制造的影响。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
